pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LOBSTERThe **L**ightweight **O**pen **B**MW **S**oftware **T**raceability**E**vidence **R**eport allows you to demonstrate software traceabilityand requirements coverage, which is essential for meeting standardssuch as ISO 26262.This package contains a tool and helper header for GoogleTest.## Tools* `lobster-gtest`: Extrat tracing data from GoogleTest XML files* [lobster_gtest.h](https://github.com/bmw-software-engineering/lobster/blob/main/../../support/gtest/include/lobster_gtest.h): A public domain header with a C/C++ macro to embed tracing tags or justifications## Copyright & License informationThe copyright holder of LOBSTER is the Bayerische Motoren WerkeAktiengesellschaft (BMW AG), and LOBSTER is published under the [GNUAffero General Public License, Version 3](../LICENSE.md).The `lobster.h` file included here is released to the public domain.
